Class Fruit

  • java.lang.Object
    • SaleableObject
      • Fruit
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Drawable

    public class Fruit
extends SaleableObject
implements Drawable
    This class is the class to control the fruits that is produced by the plants, it is a derived class from SaleableObject
